Package hk.edu.polyu.comp.comp2021.g17.cvfs.model.file

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Directory
    A child class of File representing directory
    Dirent
    A class represents the content of a Directory It stores a table of String-File pair, the String being name of the File
    Disk
    A class represents Disk A disk has a root Directory A disk has a current working Directory A disk keeps a path to current working directory A disk has a maximum size, as specified during construction
    Document
    A child class of File A Document has a DocumentType.
    File
    Abstract class File representing file objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DocumentType
    An enum class represents Document Type.
    FileType
    An enum class represents type of the file.
